verses.verse: The burden <S%H4853><s%> of Moab. <S%H4124><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> in the night <S%H3915><s%> Ar <S%H6144><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> is laid <S%H7901><s%> waste, <S%H7703><s%> and brought <S%H1820><s%> to silence; <S%H1820><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> in the night <S%H3915><s%> Kir <S%H7024><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> is laid waste, <S%H7703><s%> and brought <S%H1820><s%> to silence; <S%H1820><s%>

He is gone <S%H5927><s%> up to Bajith, <S%H1006><s%> and to Dibon, <S%H1769><s%> the high <S%H1116><s%> places, to weep: <S%H1065><s%> Moab <S%H4124><s%> shall howl <S%H3213><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Nebo, <S%H5015><s%> and over <S%H5921><s%> Medeba: <S%H4311><s%> on all <S%H3605><s%> their heads <S%H7218><s%> shall be baldness, <S%H7144><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> beard <S%H2206><s%> cut <S%H1438><s%> off.

In their streets <S%H2351><s%> they shall gird <S%H2296><s%> themselves with sackcloth: <S%H8242><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the tops <S%H1406><s%> of their houses, and in their streets, <S%H7339><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> one shall howl, <S%H3213><s%> weeping <S%H1065><s%> abundantly. <S%H3381><s%>

And Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> shall cry, <S%H2199><s%> and Elealeh: <S%H500><s%> their voice <S%H6963><s%> shall be heard <S%H8085><s%> even to Jahaz: <S%H3096><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the armed <S%H2502><s%> soldiers <S%H2502><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> shall cry <S%H7321><s%> out; his life <S%H5315><s%> shall be grievous <S%H3415><s%> to him.

My heart <S%H3820><s%> shall cry <S%H2199><s%> out for Moab; <S%H4124><s%> his fugitives <S%H1280><s%> shall flee to Zoar, <S%H6820><s%> an heifer <S%H5697><s%> of three <S%H7992><s%> years old: <S%H7992><s%> for by the mounting <S%H4608><s%> up of Luhith <S%H3872><s%> with weeping <S%H1065><s%> shall they go <S%H5927><s%> it up; for in the way <S%H1870><s%> of Horonaim <S%H2773><s%> they shall raise <S%H5782><s%> up a cry <S%H2201><s%> of destruction. <S%H7667><s%>

For the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Nimrim <S%H5249><s%> shall be desolate: <S%H4923><s%> for the hay <S%H2682><s%> is withered <S%H3001><s%> away, the grass <S%H1877><s%> fails, <S%H3615><s%> there is no <S%H3808><s%> green <S%H3418><s%> thing.

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the abundance <S%H3502><s%> they have gotten, <S%H6213><s%> and that which they have laid <S%H6486><s%> up, shall they carry <S%H5375><s%> away to the brook <S%H5158><s%> of the willows. <S%H6155><s%>

For the cry <S%H2201><s%> is gone <S%H5362><s%> round <S%H5362><s%> about the borders <S%H1366><s%> of Moab; <S%H4124><s%> the howling <S%H3213><s%> thereof to Eglaim, <S%H97><s%> and the howling <S%H3213><s%> thereof to Beerelim. <S%H879><s%>

For the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Dimon <S%H1775><s%> shall be full <S%H4390><s%> of blood: <S%H1818><s%> for I will bring <S%H7896><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> on Dimon, <S%H1775><s%> lions <S%H738><s%> on him that escapes <S%H6413><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and on the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the land. <S%H127><s%>
